subject: RE: [junit] Failed to invoke suite(): java.lang.StackOverflowErro	r
msgSnippet: Seems like an endless loop somewhere in the code. Is it possible you wrote some TestSuites yourself ? If suite A loads suite B and B loads A, this could
messageBody:
Seems like an endless loop somewhere in the code.
Is it possible you wrote some TestSuites yourself ?
If suite A loads suite B and B loads A, this could happen...
Or if suite A does something like:
public Test suite(){
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(A.suite());//endless loop !
...
return suite;
}
What happens before the StackOverflowError ? Other output ?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: k_b_konuri [mailto:k_b_konuri@...]
> Sent: zaterdag 3 augustus 2002 8:46
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Failed to invoke suite():
> java.lang.StackOverflowError
>
>
> Hi,
> I am new to JUnit and when i try to run the example given in
> JUnit/samples, i am getting the following runtime error:
> Failed to invoke suite(): java.lang.StackOverflowError.
> i am using Eclipse 2.0 IDE and running using the option
> Run As-->JUint Test
> can someone help me out with this.
> Thanks,
> Kishore.
>
